block.p: BASEBALL American League KANSAS CITY ROYALS- Sent C Jorge Fabregas and OF Mark Quinn to Omaha of the PCL. Recalled RHP Jeff D'Amico and OF Todd Dunwoody from Omaha. OKALAND ATHLTICS - Activated DH John Jaha from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned 3B Adam Piatt to Sacramento of the PCL. TEXAS RANGERS - Placed OF Ruben Mateo on 15-day disabled list. Purchased OF Scott Podsednik from Tulsa of the Texas League. Transferred LHP Justin Thompson from 15- to 60-day disabled list. National League ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS - Designated LHP Bill Pulsipher for assignment. LOS ANGELES DODGERS - Placed OF Geronimo Berroa on the 15-day disabled list. Designated LHP Trever Miller for assignment. Recalled LHP Onan Masaoka from Albuquerque of the PCL. Purchased the contract of INF Shawn Gilbert from Albuquerque. MONTREAL EXPOS - Activated RHP Anthony Telford from the 15-day disabled list. Recalled LHP T. J. Tucker from Harrisburg of the Eastern League. NEW YORK METS - Optioned C Vance Wilson to Norfolk of the International League.

BASEBALL American League KANSAS CITY ROYALS- Sent C Jorge Fabregas and OF Mark Quinn to Omaha of the PCL. Recalled RHP Jeff D'Amico and OF Todd Dunwoody from Omaha. OKALAND ATHLTICS - Activated DH John Jaha from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned 3B Adam Piatt to Sacramento of the PCL. TEXAS RANGERS - Placed OF Ruben Mateo on 15-day disabled list. Purchased OF Scott Podsednik from Tulsa of the Texas League. Transferred LHP Justin Thompson from 15- to 60-day disabled list. National League ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS - Designated LHP Bill Pulsipher for assignment. LOS ANGELES DODGERS - Placed OF Geronimo Berroa on the 15-day disabled list. Designated LHP Trever Miller for assignment. Recalled LHP Onan Masaoka from Albuquerque of the PCL. Purchased the contract of INF Shawn Gilbert from Albuquerque. MONTREAL EXPOS - Activated RHP Anthony Telford from the 15-day disabled list. Recalled LHP T. J. Tucker from Harrisburg of the Eastern League. NEW YORK METS - Optioned C Vance Wilson to Norfolk of the International League.
National Football League CLEVELAND BROWNS - Signed WR JaJuan Dawson and CB Lewis Sanders to three-year contracts.

National Hockey League MONTREAL CANADIENS - Agreed to terms with D Francois Beauchemin and F Michael Ryder on three-year contracts. OTTAWA SENATORS - Acquired G Rich Parent from Tampa Bay for a 2000 seventh-round draft pick and signed him to a one-year contract.

Major League Soccer MLS - Suspended Miami MF Henry Gutierre for one game and fined him $500 and suspended Miami MF Martin Machon for two games and fined him $1,500 for confronting officials following a game against Columbus on May 27.
SYRACUSE - Named Seth Williams men's and women's assistant swimming and diving coach. Promoted Ellie Walker to men's and womens' assistant swimming and diving coach.
